casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Wilfredo RAMOS, Petitioner No. 509 EAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. April 11, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 11th day of April, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Petitioner's "Motion for leave to File Reply Brief in Further Support of Petition for Allowance of Appeal" be DENIED.
